name: Bear
tagline: Our business is to add value to yours.
description:
We are an independent, London based creative branding agency with an international reach and a decade of proven results. We blend intelligent positioning with unforgettable creative to maximise the value of our clients' brands.
We help shape brands, inject or project personality and, most importantly, boost our clients' bottom line.

locations.address: Interchange Atrium Stables Market Chalk Farm Road
